title: JPMC | Offer Evaluation | SE III
content:
Education: BTech (NIT)
Years of Experience: 7 years
Prior Experience: Indian Fintech 
Current CTC: 33 LPA (fixed)
Date of the Offer: October 2024
Company: JP Morgan Chase
Title/Level: SE 3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 43 LPA (fixed)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: 5 LPA (verbally confirmed)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 48 LPA
Benefits: Standard JPMC benefits

Please evaluate this offer. Any insights on work culture etc. would be really helpful.
There is no written confirmation on Bonus. Is it normal for JPMC?

title: Pocket FM | Senior Software Engineer | Bangalore | Oct '24 offer
content:
Education: BTech (IT) Tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 6
Prior Experience: Tech Lead at product based startup
Previous Compensation: 30L fixed + 5L ESOPs 

Date of the Offer : Oct '24
Company : Pocket FM
Title/Level : Senior Software Engineer
Location : Bangalore
Salary: 32L Fixed 
Performance Bonus: 2L
Signing Bonus: 2L  
Stock: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus) : 36L
Benefits : Standard
Other details: Hybrid with 2 days WFO. Offer was non-negotiable and exploding (expires in 48 hours).
